data.message: Keep pissin these pussies off Em! Detroit got your back and the good half of America does too, dont forget all the love from other nations too! ❤

replies.message: Not only the Americans love him....My favourite white rapper Em doing the damn thing....Let him say what he has got to say
90% of Europe can see he speaks the truth also. There's a lot of non-brainwashed folks on this side of the pond and we know Em's right.

There is a huge contradiction in your argument there tough guy. The only one who was pissed off and being a pussy was eminem being so triggered and offended by the orange giant. Grow a fucking pair of balls you bitches. We lived through every president in the past and we will continue to do so. Apparently you ignorant clowns have had NO EDUCATION on how the government works here in the good ole United States. We elected PRESIDENTS NOT DICTATORS. Get that through your think minded skulls.
Branden Newman, people like you that just go with the flow even when its not right, your the problem, your a sheep 🐑 go Baaaaa off ✌
I hope you like what the democrats have done with the place living in Detroit Alexis Smith.
Detroit is fine honestly there's plenty of nice areas to be honest
He probably voted for Trump because he knows how crappy Democrats made Detroit. He was simply getting ignorant people to buy his new album and y'all fell for it lol. Ghetto people are easily tricked.
He’s a black wanna be, grow up Em was cool when I was 18 now he’s washed up and rusty as hell. I could have rhymes better than him
